DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate efficacy safety ASKP1240 , anti-CD40 monoclonal antibody , prophylaxis organ rejection kidney transplantation . This study compare efficacy basiliximab induction , ASKP1240 , mycophenolate mofetil ( MMF ) , steroid [ calcineurin inhibitor ( CNI ) avoidance ] standard care immunosuppressive regimen ( basiliximab induction + tacrolimus + MMF + steroid ) . In addition , study compare efficacy basiliximab induction , ASKP1240 , tacrolimus steroid [ CNI minimization-MMF avoidance ] standard care immunosuppressive regimen ( basiliximab induction + tacrolimus + MMF + steroid ) .
DOC.brief_title: A Study Assess Efficacy Safety ASKP1240 de Novo Kidney Transplant Recipients
DOC.detailed_description: Subjects follow 6 month . Upon completion first 6 month study , subject may participate Long Term Extension period study . Subjects remain original treatment arm three year post-transplant ( / Sponsor discontinues development subject longer wish participate study ) .
DOC.criteria: Subject recipient de novo kidney living decease donor Subject induction therapy , studyassigned basiliximab , plan part initial immunosuppressive regimen Subject previously receive receive organ transplant kidney Subject receive solitary kidney decease donor < 5 year age Subject receive kidney anticipate cold ischemia time ( CIT ) > 30 hour Subject receive kidney meet Extended Criteria Donor ( ECD ) Donation Cardiac Death ( DCD ) criterion . Note : kidney meet either ECD DCD criterion eligible inclusion Subject receive ABO incompatible donor kidney Subject current calculate panel reactive antibody ( cPRA ) level > 50 %
